title: would this work?
body: what would happen if tahm kench swallows and ally with his W and started ulting, can thresh jump in for Tahm's ult and chuck a lantern behind, which kallista uses and pulls her oathsworn with her. so like teleporting your whole team to one spot? i hope you can understand.

replies.body: I can see this champion is going to be more buggy than azir.
sounds plausible, but I think tahm goes too fast for lantern to work, it might bug out/disconnect and only bring tahm thresh

You'd need to click the lantern BEFORE the ult gets triggered. But theory-wise, it should work.
(except for the fact that Tahm cannot ult after swallowing someone, so you're one step short of teleporting the whole team)

As in sometimes it will snap.
Example, if you try to Nocturne/Vi ult too far (someone escaping with recall/tp) it can carry half way or about the original ult length and stop.
Suggesting the same thing may happen with Thresh W but idk.

Might be there's a max thread lenght for those.
In any case, Ekko could get back and leave you there alone, which is not very nice of him.

Tahm can't use the latern while eating someone. 
His ultimate is disabled whilst eating something.
haha id love to see that, would be legendary
